data.title: Maya Rudolph Movies and Shows
data.meta_description: Learn about Maya Rudolph on Apple TV. Browse shows and movies that feature Maya Rudolph including IF, Luca, and more.
data.text:
Book of Joe

Peter helps Joe realize his dream of publishing a book, but things get out of hand when Peter takes over as the author. Meanwhile, Brian starts exercising to the extreme after experiencing a euphoric runner's high for the first time.

Coral Palms, Pt. 1

Jake and Holt remain in Florida, adjusting to their new lives under the Witness Protection Program, while Jimmy "The Butcher" Figgis is still on the loose. Their one human link to their regular lives is U.S. Marshall Karen Haas (guest star Maya Rudolph, "Maya and Marty"), but their anonymity may be in danger when a video of them goes viral.

Coral Palms, Pt. 2

After Jimmy "The Butcher" Figgis sees Jake and Holt's viral video, the two begin plotting their attack. However, when caught red-handed, the- are forced to experience the other side of the interrogation table. Back at the precinct, a questionable new Captain (guest star Ken Marino, "Childrens Hospital") takes over.

The Homer of Seville

Homer discovers that, when lying flat on his back, he has a beautiful singing voice. He becomes targeted for death by a mysterious groupie.

The Burrito

Eleanor (Kristen Bell), Chidi (William Jackson Harper), Tahani (Jameela Jamil) and Jason (Manny Jacinto) consider just how much they have (or have not) improved. Michael (Ted Danson) is left to deal with the consequences of his recent actions.
